title: Since last Ubuntu Linux update: Have repeatedly restart TB, in not used after (approx) 60 minutes, to read emails
content:
Ever since the last TB update through Ubuntu Linux, I have to restart if I haven't checked downloaded messages, this only occurs after about 60 minutes of not checking/reading emails.

I have TB open all day, with it checking for new messages on a preset time cycle, been using it this way since around '99/'00 (I think) when I first started using it. My health is poor so, I only check to see what's new every couple of hours or so.

When I start to read new emails, I double click on 1st unread to open in its own window, most emails are then deleted, and this is where I have trouble, the next email shows as a blank window, with TB showing the Loading bar in the LR corner. At this point, closing the email's window & reopening on it, makes no difference, TB just hangs on "opening email".

The only way to fix this is by restarting TB, and even then, it may require 2-3 more restarts to be able to read the rest of the downloaded messages. Then, if I don't try to read any emails within the (approx) 60 minute time frame, the issue reoccurs.

Thunderbird version: 140.2.0esr (64-bit) System Details Report ---

    1. Report details

- **Date generated:** 2025-09-13 18:01:31

    1. Hardware Information:

- **Hardware Model:** ASUS ROG CROSSHAIR VII HERO _WI-FI_ - **Memory:** 32.0 GiB - **Processor:** AMD Ryzen™ 7 2700 × 16 - **Graphics:** Radeon™ RX 580 Series - **Disk Capacity:** 5.5 TB

    1. Software Information:

- **Firmware Version:** 4603 - **OS Name:** Ubuntu 24.04.3 LTS - **OS Build:** (null) - **OS Type:** 64-bit - **GNOME Version:** 46 - **Windowing System:** Wayland - **Kernel Version:** Linux 6.8.0-79-generic
creator: netsurf

Does Thunderbird have a recommended method or tool for safely restoring lost emails without risking data security?

Thanks!

title: Connexion to Thunderbird
content:
Bonjour je possède un compte thunderbird sur lequel je reçois les messages personnels et j'ai rféée 3 adresses, ne pour mon épouse et 2 pour mes enfants. Le problème c'est quez je ne retrouve pas le mot de passe pour le compte de mon épouse, ce qui fait qu'elle ne reçoit plus les messages sur Thunderbird et elle est obligée de se connecter sur son compte Orange. Elle perd ainsi beaucoup de temps ainsi que les facilités associées à votre application. De plus je n'arrive pas à modifier son mot de passe. Comment puis je faire ? Pouvez-vous m'aider ? En vous remerciant

Hello, I have a Thunderbird account where I receive personal messages, and I've referenced three addresses: one for my wife and two for my children. The problem is that I can't find the password for my wife's account, which means she no longer receives messages on Thunderbird and is forced to log in to her Orange account. This wastes a lot of time and the convenience of your application. Furthermore, I can't change her password. What can I do? Can you help me? Thank you.

title: Tethering problems. Some emails not transferring to laptop
content:
USB Tethering.

1000s of emails have transferred from android to Thunderbird on laptop with no problem. From about 10:30 am this morning they suddenly stopped. I tried a test email at 2:30 pm, after switching both devices off and on again, It transferred perfectly. The emails are very important and still on my phone but not on my laptop. Please can someone suggest what might have happened and is it possible to force the transfer?

I didn’t setup any email settings when changing from a router to tethering but it has always worked OK until now.
creator: justmegt

title: Thunderbird will not change text colours
content:
I am running Tbird 142.0, iMac OS X Ventura 13.7.7 However, this problem has been going on for several versions of Tbird and Ventura, going back at least a year.

The problem: I cannot change text colour in a new message. The suggestions provided at https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1477095 don't work: I am closing colour dialogs correctly and I cannot find a colour override setting, or anything that appears similar, in any Settings menu. The closest is Settings > Composition > HTML Style > Text Color which also has no effect.

Also, if I use an html file for a signature, Tbird ignores the color tag.

I have an older iMac running 10.13.6 and Tbird 78. Everything works there.

I am baffled! Suggestions much appreciated!
creator: sivarik

content: Dobrý den. Promazával jsem zprávy a jednu zprávu se nedaří smazat.Prošel jsem různé řešení ale nedaří se. Když na řádek kliknu pavým tl. tak se sice objeví možnosti včetně koš ale pokud dám koš tak dole na spodním řádku běží přesouvání zpráv do složky Trash... ale nic se neděje.Jak to vymazat?Mám to na 3 pc a všude se to chová stejně.Chtěl jsem samotný mail vymazat ale nevím kde ho hledat.

title: Account completamente sparito
content:
Buona sera,

oggi per la prima volta da anni, cliccando sull'icona di Thunderbird non ho più trovato l'account con tutti i correlati: messaggi, rubrica, tutto! Recentemente c'è stato un aggiornamento, ma non mi sembra che la cosa sia accaduta immediatamente dopo.

Comunque: ho Ubuntu Ubuntu 64-bits versione 22.04.5 LTS versione di Gnome 42.9

La configurazione del client di posta è SSL/TLS:

IMAP In entrata imap.gmail.com In uscita smtp.gmail.com

Provando a configurare di nuovo un account email già esistente, inserisco la password nel modulo, ma non succede nulla se non che inizia a verificare la pswd e rimane fermo lì per tanti minuti.

Cosa posso fare? Si rimetterà a posto con un altro aggiornamento?

Grazie mille a chi mi aiuterà!
creator: luciamarinolb
